sample_docs: Cloud-Based Solutions Cloud-based biometric technology is faster than the traditional biometric technology. You also get improved speeds because of the reduced system complexities. Hosting in the cloud such as Salesforce Github is also advantageous in that there is no need to schedule software updates and maintenance, meaning improved uptime. Many organizations that have yet to move their ABIS to the cloud fail to do so because of perceived cloud security and privacy issues. The fact is, however, that customers and cloud providers can now create a governance framework by leveraging existing ISO 27001 and ISO 27002 standards which, together, provide the requirements for creating the necessary controls to use and implement security best practices. T4ISB will help you choose the best biometrics and blockchain solution for your business and deploy it for you. < Back Cloud-Based Solutions Cloud-based biometric technology is faster than the traditional biometric technology. IT Solutions for Your Industry Identity & Biometrics We are a leading provider of biometrics, identity and access management solutions, assisting clients with selection, deployment and on-going support of simple, affordable and sustainable solutions to keep organisations safe and competitive. Digitally transform by embracing modern APIs, microservices, processes and payment capabilities. Digital Transformation We help you integrate of digital technologies into your business areas, fundamentally changing how you operate and deliver value to your customers. We provide simple Solutions for Complex Connections. Government We have the right solutions for public safety and provide Automated Biometric Identification Systems (ABIS) integration and workflows.
